titles.title: Give me a sight, O Savior

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, make me understand it, Help me to take it in, What it meant to Thee, the Holy One, To bear away my sin.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Give me a sight, O Savior, Of Thy wondrous love to me, Of the love that brought Thee down to earth, To die on Calvary.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Was it the nails, O Savior, That bound Thee to the tree? Nay, ’twas Thine everlasting love, Thy love for me, for me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, wonder of all wonders, That through Thy death for me, My open sins, my secret sins, Can all forgiven be.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then melt my heart, O Savior, Bend me, yea, break me down, Until I own Thee Conqueror, And Lord and Sov’reign crown.{/lang-eng}
